Articles.Content:
Today, I have reached a milestone. This day marks my 1 year anniversary on the forums. In that amount of time, I have gotten a lot better in KSP, I have been part of @Spaceception's book editing team, and released some crafts. I have met several awesome people, made new friends and learned a lot of things from science to history. The list could go on and on and on. The KSP community has given me a lot and for that I want to say, thank you! Thank you to the developers for making such a wonderful game. And thank you, forumers for this amazing community, the best I've seen. 

Stay awesome!
